SELECT /* Company_Mysql.xml company.getCompanyCount */ COUNT(1) FROM TB_COMPANY_MASTER A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.INSERT_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID#
AND A.BIZ_ENTITY_ID = #SEARCH_BIZ_ENTITY_ID#
AND A.COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_COMP_NM#,'%')

SELECT /* Company_Mysql.xml company.getCompanyList */ BIZ_ENTITY_ID , BIZ_ENTITY_TYPE , BIZ_TYPE , BIZ_LICENSE_NO , COMP_NM , COMP_CEO_ID , ADDR_COUNTRY , ADDR_PROVINCE , ADDR_CITY , ADDR_FULL , PHONE_COUNTRY_NO , PHONE_NO , SMART_PHONE_NO , EMAIL_ID , VALID_YN , EXPIRED_DATE , SNS_TYPE , SNS_ID FROM TB_COMPANY_MASTER A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.INSERT_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID#
AND A.BIZ_ENTITY_ID = #SEARCH_BIZ_ENTITY_ID#
AND A.COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_COMP_NM#,'%')
ORDER BY A.INSERT_DT DESC

SELECT /* Company_Mysql.xml company.getCompanyDetail */ BIZ_ENTITY_ID , BIZ_ENTITY_TYPE , BIZ_TYPE , BIZ_LICENSE_NO , COMP_NM , COMP_CEO_ID , ADDR_COUNTRY , ADDR_PROVINCE , ADDR_CITY , ADDR_FULL , PHONE_COUNTRY_NO , PHONE_NO , SMART_PHONE_NO , EMAIL_ID , VALID_YN , EXPIRED_DATE , SNS_TYPE , SNS_ID FROM TB_COMPANY_MASTER A WHERE A.BIZ_ENTITY_ID= #SEARCH_BIZ_ENTITY_ID#

SELECT /* Company_Mysql.xml company.getBizEntityId */ CONCAT(#BIZ_ENTITY_TYPE#, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y%m'), IFNULL((SELECT SUBSTR(BIZ_ENTITY_ID, 6, 3) AS SERIAL_NO FROM TB_COMPANY_MASTER), '001')) FROM DUAL;
